price: 7. (Durant leur vie en ce bas monde), ils respectaient leurs vœux et redoutaient un jour au mal envahissant.
arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yūfūna bil-nadhri wayakhāfūna yawman kāna sharruhu mus'taṭīran
